text: 'in allah taealaa yamurukum bi'ada' mukhtalif alamanat, alty awtmntm ealayha 'iilaa ashabha, fala tfrtu fyha, wayamurukum bialqada' bayn alnaas bialeadl walqst, 'iidha qadaytum bynhm, wniem ma yaeizukum allah bih wayahdiakum 'ilyh. 'iina allah taealaa kan smyeana laqwalkm, muttaleana ealaa sayr aemalkm, bsyrana bha
